Subskills.name: Grouping Up
Subskills.description: Chance to attach an additional explosive to a nearby target on hit.

Subskills.name: Gunner's Glory
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by explosive bullets when wielding a gun.

Subskills.name: Chain Reaction
Subskills.description: Explosive bullet now explodes multiple times.

Subskills.name: Sudden Scatter
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to fire an additional explosive bullet.

Subskills.name: Boss Killer
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by explosive bullets against bosses.

Subskills.name: Multiplosion
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash additional explosions.

Subskills.name: Explosion Site
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius for explosive bullet.

Subskills.name: Penetrating Trail
Subskills.description: Explosive bullet now pierces and sticks explosives to all monsters hit.

Subskills.name: Target Locked
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using explosive bullets.

Subskills.name: Napalm Infusion
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Gasoline
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Shotwave
Subskills.description: On hit create a shockwave of explosions towards the target dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Blast Pulse
Subskills.description: Explosive bullet now deals increased damage and knocks nearby monsters back with massive force.
